synopsis.text: Their identity shrouded in mystery, the Phantom Thief Queen, along with their trusted ally Joker and their airship Troubadour, traverse the globe, leaving no target unattainable. This time, their sights are set on the fabled, cursed gemstone, the Rose of Linden. However, a formidable circus troupe, armed with hypnotists, acrobats, and magicians, stands in their way. The circus members challenge the Queen to a duel of wits and skills, with the jewel as the prize. With their reputation on the line, the Phantom Thief Queen must outsmart and outmaneuver the circus troupe to claim the Rose of Linden. In a world dominated by airships, the Queen's daring escapades continue, proving that no challenge is too great for this legendary thief.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
